programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution
programme.desc: Some of the most interesting adaptations in the animal world are completely invisible. Study these hidden, internal alterations to see how different animals have evolved to survive in amazing and unseen ways.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed
programme.desc: During the dry season, thousands of animals head to the Acacia loop looking for food. Watch as each species must establish a place in the pecking order and avoid hungry and dangerous predators.

programme.title: Zambia Untamed
programme.desc: Mvula is the youngest calf in the elephant family. Temperatures are soaring. Lagoons and water holes are drying up. Witness the long and risky journey Mvula and his family must make to the only source of water, the Luangwa river.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo
programme.desc: The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo
programme.desc: Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo
programme.desc: Follow several different males as they roam the land, climb up the social ladder, and fight for their mating rights in Eastern Grey colony. For these bucks, the drive to perpetuate their species promises a life full of risk and reward.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Meet six animal pairs who have developed unusual attachments. From a duck who overcame his fear of water thanks to a lake-loving dog to an orphaned deer who found friendship with a herd of cows, their bonds have surprising benefits.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: When in need, animals sometimes turn to other species for companionship. See how a U.S. turkey who escaped dinner pairs up with a rescue dog, tiny U.K. songbirds raise a cuckoo chick, and a lonely meerkat in Namibia becomes part of a mongoose family.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: The instinct to protect young ones is hard to suppress. Marvel at the way animals, both male and female, care for babies of other species. Meet a lonely rabbit who babysits lambs, and a little rescued rhino who finds encouragement from a playful dog.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Animals need companionship, just like humans, and these odd couples found it in species outside their own. Meet a miniature pig who befriends an outcast dog, and an orphaned baby kangaroo who shares a handmade pouch with a motherless little wombat.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Support animals for humans are common, but when they support other species, things get a little wild. Meet a troop of monkeys who invite three rescue cats into their home in a rescue centre, and a playful dog who cares for a rescued calf.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Rescue animals share a unique bond. Encounter these odd animal pals, including a bison who befriends a young calf, and an antelope who bonds with a young calf, as they team up to heal and sometimes return to the wild.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia
programme.desc: Get to know Australia’s fiercest birds of prey. Find out how highly specialized killers like falcons, eagles, ospreys, and owls use special senses and traits to survive.

programme.title: Wild Birds Of Australia
programme.desc: Meet four bird species that go to exceptional lengths to find mates and raise their young. See how they protect their territory from invaders, attract the ideal mate, and safeguard their chicks to give them the best chance at life.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Meet six animal pairs who have developed unusual attachments. From a duck who overcame his fear of water thanks to a lake-loving dog to an orphaned deer who found friendship with a herd of cows, their bonds have surprising benefits.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: When in need, animals sometimes turn to other species for companionship. See how a U.S. turkey who escaped dinner pairs up with a rescue dog, tiny U.K. songbirds raise a cuckoo chick, and a lonely meerkat in Namibia becomes part of a mongoose family.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: The instinct to protect young ones is hard to suppress. Marvel at the way animals, both male and female, care for babies of other species. Meet a lonely rabbit who babysits lambs, and a little rescued rhino who finds encouragement from a playful dog.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Animals need companionship, just like humans, and these odd couples found it in species outside their own. Meet a miniature pig who befriends an outcast dog, and an orphaned baby kangaroo who shares a handmade pouch with a motherless little wombat.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Support animals for humans are common, but when they support other species, things get a little wild. Meet a troop of monkeys who invite three rescue cats into their home in a rescue centre, and a playful dog who cares for a rescued calf.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Rescue animals share a unique bond. Encounter these odd animal pals, including a bison who befriends a young calf, and an antelope who bonds with a young calf, as they team up to heal and sometimes return to the wild.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo
programme.desc: The Eastern Grey kangaroo is a sociable species, clustering together in small groups known as mobs. A mob is a social network focused on feeding, where members will come and go as they please, depending on the availability of food.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo
programme.desc: Eastern Grey kangaroos are prolific breeders, but bringing up baby is fraught with challenges. Predators, climate extremes, and lively joeys mean kangaroo mothers face a daily struggle to keep their young alive.

programme.title: Secret Life of the Kangaroo
programme.desc: Follow several different males as they roam the land, climb up the social ladder, and fight for their mating rights in Eastern Grey colony. For these bucks, the drive to perpetuate their species promises a life full of risk and reward.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Meet six animal pairs who have developed unusual attachments. From a duck who overcame his fear of water thanks to a lake-loving dog to an orphaned deer who found friendship with a herd of cows, their bonds have surprising benefits.

programme.title: Nature Scenes
programme.desc: One half hour of uninterrupted footage of an adorable koala joey and its mom. Watch as this joey eats, sleeps, cuddles and explores high up in the trees. Animals in captivity filmed at Australia's Ballarat Wildlife Park.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: A Hawaiian volcano called Kilauea is one of the most active in the world. After years of constant lava activity, see how a sudden collapse of the crater floor and a massive eruption drains it of lava, making the volcano possible to explore.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys
programme.desc: Visit Anak Krakatoa as it enters a violent phase. Known as "The Child of Fire," this volcano is an ancestor of Krakatoa, a volcano known for the largest eruption in modern history. Will its descendant repeat the pattern?

programme.title: Tales From Zambia
programme.desc: Some animals survive with a little help from their friends. Witness the ways buffalo, lions, hyenas, wild dogs, and even some birds work together to help each other protect their offspring, overcome predators, hunt, and defend their territory.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School
programme.desc: It’s a first at forest school. Inside the clinic, the team meets a mysterious new creature. It turns out to be a sun bear-the tiniest of all bears! Find out how Denny Bear fares in these new surroundings.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth
programme.desc: Witness some of the planet’s most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends
programme.desc: Meet six animal pairs who have developed unusual attachments. From a duck who overcame his fear of water thanks to a lake-loving dog to an orphaned deer who found friendship with a herd of cows, their bonds have surprising benefits.

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Tide
programme.desc: Low tide exposes a band of shore called the intertidal zone. It’s a place of stunning extremes, attacked by hurricane force waves and exposed to baking heat. Creatures here have evolved in countless bizarre ways. Scientists explore this alien realm.

programme.title: Alaskan Summer
programme.desc: Discover the majesty of the US’s most northern state. Shot in stunning HDR, travel from the breathtaking coves and bays of Baranof Island, to the Glacier Bay where humpback and killer whales navigate among towering glaciers and soaring mountains.

programme.title: Tempó-magazin (?)
programme.desc: A Tempó Autósport Magazin több mint húsz éve szállítja a híreket, a verseny összefoglalókat elsősorban a magyar autósportról ugyanakkor időről-időre kitekint a nemzetközi porondra is, leginkább azokra az eseményekre, ahol magyar versenyzők indulnak. A legfontosabb, legnézettebb futamok első helyen szerepelnek a Tempó kínálatában, így a rali, a rallycross számít a legfontosabb eseménynek a szerkesztőség életében. Emellett beszámolnak a gyorsasági bajnokság, a tereprali, az autocross futamok történéseiről is.

Trash Talk (?)
programme.desc: (Ismétlés). Amerikai sportokkal foglalkozó talkshow különleges sportágakkal, egyedi témákkal. A műsorvezető mellett öt állandó szakértő segít tájékozódni többek között a legnépszerűbb amerikai profi ligák fontos eseményei között, de részesei lehetünk az Amerikában oly népszerű küzdősport-eseményeknek, akár az UFC által szervezett ketrecharcgáláknak is.

programme.title: AEROsport (?)
programme.desc: A Sport TV országos televízió csatornán futó, repülős magazin. Tartalmát illetően a sportrepülés köré épülő témákat dolgoz fel. A műsor hangvétele laza és sok újdonságot vonultat fel, ugyanakkor tekintélyt sugárzó, pörgős, szórakoztató is egyben. A műsor célja érdekes, szórakoztató, trendi és pörgősen fiatalos formában feldolgozni egy-egy szélesebb rétegeket is érintő, a sportrepülés köré épülő tematikát. A műsor úgy dolgozza fel a repülés témákat, hogy közben a néző is remekül szórakozik. Olyan exkluzív dolgokat igyekszik bemutatni, amelyről eddig nem, vagy csak keveset hallottak. Számos érdekes embert, különleges gépet, repülőteret, gyorsasági tesztet készítünk. Rendszeresen jelen vagyunk magyarországi sportrepülős eseményeken.

programme.title: A nap hőse (?)
programme.desc: Nem csak idősebb korunkra válhatunk példaképpé, sokan már tizenévesen azok lesznek! A DIGI Sport minisorozata olyan fiatal tehetségeket mutat be, akik teljesítményükkel, eredményeikkel kiemelkednek a kortársaik közül. A minisorozat különálló, 5-7 perces epizódjaiban ilyen fiatalokról láthatnak portrékat a nézőink. Az egyes portrékban bemutatjuk a főszereplőt, megismerjük a sportágát, megkérdezzük tapasztalatairól, bemutatjuk az eddig elért eredményeit, megmutatjuk környezetét, betekintünk edzéseire, megismerjük és meghallgatjuk az edzőjét és akár hozzátartozóit, családját is.

programme.title: A nap hőse (?)
programme.desc: Nem csak idősebb korunkra válhatunk példaképpé, sokan már tizenévesen azok lesznek! A DIGI Sport minisorozata olyan fiatal tehetségeket mutat be, akik teljesítményükkel, eredményeikkel kiemelkednek a kortársaik közül. A minisorozat különálló, 5-7 perces epizódjaiban ilyen fiatalokról láthatnak portrékat a nézőink. Az egyes portrékban bemutatjuk a főszereplőt, megismerjük a sportágát, megkérdezzük tapasztalatairól, bemutatjuk az eddig elért eredményeit, megmutatjuk környezetét, betekintünk edzéseire, megismerjük és meghallgatjuk az edzőjét és akár hozzátartozóit, családját is.

programme.title: S.E.F.T. (?)
programme.desc: A DIGI Sport új, napi rendszerességgel jelentkező magazinműsora komoly küldetéssel indul útjára. Célunk, hogy olyan inspiráló személyeket mutassunk be, akik _ legyenek akár profi vagy hobbisportolók, fiatalok vagy idősek, hírességek vagy civilek _ minden nap tesznek valamit az egészségükért. A műsorban nagyító alá vesszük a szereplők általános szemléletmódját, táplálkozását, sportolási szokásait, valamint ellessük apró praktikáikat, amelyekkel be tudják illeszteni a sportos, egészséges és fitt, azaz a #sefter életmódot rohanó hétköznapjaikba.

programme.title: A nap hőse (?)
programme.desc: Nem csak idősebb korunkra válhatunk példaképpé, sokan már tizenévesen azok lesznek! A DIGI Sport minisorozata olyan fiatal tehetségeket mutat be, akik teljesítményükkel, eredményeikkel kiemelkednek a kortársaik közül. A minisorozat különálló, 5-7 perces epizódjaiban ilyen fiatalokról láthatnak portrékat a nézőink. Az egyes portrékban bemutatjuk a főszereplőt, megismerjük a sportágát, megkérdezzük tapasztalatairól, bemutatjuk az eddig elért eredményeit, megmutatjuk környezetét, betekintünk edzéseire, megismerjük és meghallgatjuk az edzőjét és akár hozzátartozóit, családját is.

programme.title: Enfusion ’97 Talents, Alkmaar, Netherlands, 19.09.2020
programme.desc: Enfusion Kickboxing is one of the world’s top Kickboxing organizations. Live events take place all over the world and include Enfusion Live and Enfusion Talent which are both full events of about 2 hours held on the same night. Enfusion represents the highest quality kickboxing in the world, as their shows constantly feature the best and most exciting line-ups possible. The exciting atmosphere, spectacular action and jaw-dropping KO's are the main reason tor the brand's success. Enfusion is a must-see event for all combat sports enthusiasts.

programme.title: Punch Down 1, Poznań, Poland 14.12.2019
programme.desc: WHAT IS PUNCHDOWN? The main idea of the competition is to have fun! Participants compete with each other on the rules of the knockout stage (bracket) in 1vs1 duels, hitting each other on the cheek with an open hand, maximum 3 blows per person. The winner is decided by a knock-out or a judge's verdict.

programme.title: Colosseum Tournament, 27.11.2020
programme.desc: An exceptional show of sound and lights, kickboxing and MMA gala, in which we will have fighters from Romania and beyond. A gala where heroes of martial arts from Romania will meet some of the strongest opponents.

programme.title: Hip Show
programme.desc: Hip Show takes combat sports to a whole new level. The fights are 2-on-2 (two teams of two fighters each) in a 3D 12x12 meters arena rather than inside a conventional flat ring. If one of the team members in the arena drops out after a knockout, the fight continues in a 2 versus 1 format. If the remaining team member can hold out for 60 seconds, the bout ends in a tie.

programme.title: Hard Knocks Fighting, Ep. 4
programme.desc: HKFC is one of the world’s premier MMA promotions, showcasing elite up and coming athletes on a global stage. With over 50 events, HKFC, has earned a reputation of being a world class organization, through its global audience and draw of talent. Athletes such as Ronda Rousey, Elias Theodorou, and Misha Cirkunov used HKFC as a staging ground for their UFC careers.

programme.title: Lux 010 Fighting League, Mexico, 18.09.2020
programme.desc: LUX FIGHTING LEAGUE is the most exclusive MMA league in Latin America. Founded in 2017, LUX has organized 6 action packed events and have already made a name for themselves by hosting some of the best fighters from Latin America. In an environment of luxury, LUX provides a great stage for rising prospects which will deliver the most exciting and full of power fights. Interesting detail is that LUX cooperates closely with UFC, sharing fighters and promoting the LUX brand.

programme.title: Fighting Rookies 2014
programme.desc: Fighting Rookies is a competition with a unique chance for a kickboxer to clim the ladder of success in his sport. The Rookies compete for a chance to become professionals and get the experience needed to succeed at the highest level. Each fighter gives his best to turn his dream into reality. What they do today builds their future and echoes into eternity!
